sentences.en: "You are an artist," she said respectfully.
sentences.cn: “您是一位艺术家，”她毕恭毕敬地说。

sentences.en: an exhibition of paintings by local artists
Cale has ploughed a more esoteric furrow as a recording artist.
sentences.cn: 作为一名录音艺人，凯尔走了一条较为冷僻的道路。

sentences.en: Eight drawings by French artist Jean Cocteau will be auctioned next week.
sentences.cn: 下周法国画家让·科克托的8幅作品将被拍卖。

sentences.en: For once, the artist'sfertile imagination failed him.
sentences.cn: 这位画家丰富的想象力曾一度枯竭。

sentences.en: He almost manages to scrape a living as an artist.
sentences.cn: 他靠当艺术家来勉强混口饭吃。

sentences.en: He was not the kind of artist who worked collaboratively.
sentences.cn: 他不是那种善于与人合作的艺术家。

sentences.en: He’s an artist in the kitchen.
Her ambition to become an artist was thwarted by failing eyesight.
sentences.cn: 她想成为艺术家的梦想由于视力衰减而破灭了。

sentences.en: I explained that I was an artist.
sentences.cn: 我解释说自己是个艺术家。

sentences.en: I see myself, first and foremost, as a working artist.
sentences.cn: 我首先还是把自己看作一名艺术工作者。

sentences.en: She says the artist's impression is an excellent likeness of her abductor.
sentences.cn: 她说这张模拟画像像极了绑架她的人。

sentences.en: She studied painting from 1926 and also worked as a commercial artist.
sentences.cn: 她从1926年起开始学画，同时还从事着商业艺术家的工作。

sentences.en: Shilling has been reborn as an artist.
sentences.cn: 希林以艺术家的身份再次出现。

sentences.en: The artist found much to his profit in the Louvre.
sentences.cn: 这位艺术家从卢浮宫受益颇多。

sentences.en: The Hayward exhibition has been curated by the artist Bernard Luthi.
sentences.cn: 海沃德艺术展是由艺术家伯纳德·吕蒂组织的。

sentences.en: The painting was sold for £665,000 — a record for the artist.
sentences.cn: 这幅画卖了665,000英镑，是这个艺术家最贵的一幅了。

words.tran_cn: 艺术的；风雅的；有美感的
附庸风雅的；装作爱好艺术的
艺术性；工艺；艺术技巧；艺术效果；艺术工作

phrases.tran_cn: 骗子；[俚]以花言巧语骗人的人；[俚]过上了舒适懒散生活的人
善于越狱的罪犯；有脱身术的人

trans.tran_en: someone who produces art, especially paintings or drawings
